statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE port = 80
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'UDP'
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS count FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT timestamp, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1'
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, port, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT destination_ip, AVG(port) AS avg_port FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY avg_port DESC
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY source_ip, destination_ip DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, packet_size FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM analysis_logs WHERE analysis_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE packet_size > 1000
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, packet_size FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT analysis_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM analysis_logs GROUP BY analysis_type HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT log_id, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM analysis_logs INNER JOIN network_traffic_logs ON analysis_logs.log_id = network_traffic_logs.log_id
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs LIMIT 5
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 1
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT log_id, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP'
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, log_message FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 1
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%router%' ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, log_message FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center' OR location = 'Office' ORDER BY device_name ASC

SELECT log_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, log_message, analysis_result FROM network_traffic_logs JOIN traffic_analysis ON network_traffic_logs.log_id = traffic_analysis.log_id WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM network_logs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT device_id, traffic_type, traffic_amount FROM traffic_logs ORDER BY traffic_amount DESC;
SELECT result_id, analysis_time, analysis_result FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%Router%';
SELECT log_time, log_message FROM network_logs WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, traffic_type, traffic_amount FROM network_devices INNER JOIN traffic_logs ON network_devices.device_id = traffic_logs.device_id;
SELECT analysis_time, analysis_result FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY analysis_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM network_logs WHERE severity >= 3;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, packets_sent, packets_received FROM traffic_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Server Room';
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM network_logs WHERE severity > 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, packets_sent, packets_received FROM traffic_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
